meanings.definition: To transmit (a program or information) by radio or television
meanings.sent1: The radio station broadcasts news every hour.
meanings.sent2: She broadcasts her music show on the local TV channel.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel broadcasted its message to the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse broadcasts its warning signal to ships in the night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher broadcasts instructions to the students through the classroom speakers.

meanings.definition: A program or information transmitted by radio or television.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to broadcasts of old radio dramas.
meanings.sent2: The live sports broadcast kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the broadcast of birds chirping on TV.
meanings.sent4: The broadcast of the concert made me feel like I was there.
meanings.sent5: The emergency broadcast alerted residents to take shelter from the storm.
